fullplot: A group of air crash survivors are stranded in the Mongolian desert with no chance of rescue. Facing a brutal environment, dwindling resources, and an attack by desert smugglers, they realize their only hope is doing the impossible... building a new plane from the wreckage of the old one.
plot: Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.
title: Flight of the Phoenix
